task: Organiza un picnic al retiro para ir con mi novia

decomposition.intro: In breaking down the task of organizing a picnic at Retiro Park to go with my girlfriend, I identified three main functional areas. The areas are structured to cover the key aspects of planning and executing a successful picnic outing. The chosen areas are based on the essential responsibilities involved in organizing a romantic picnic experience.

subtasks.description: Responsible for planning the practical aspects of the picnic outing.
responsibilities: Selecting a suitable date and time for the picnic
Choosing the location within Retiro Park for the picnic
Organizing transportation to and from the park if needed

subtasks.description: Responsible for arranging the culinary aspects of the picnic.
responsibilities: Creating a menu of picnic-friendly foods and beverages
Shopping for the necessary ingredients and supplies
Packing and transporting the food and beverages to the picnic location

subtasks.description: Responsible for setting the mood and creating a romantic atmosphere at the picnic.
responsibilities: Bringing along decorations such as a picnic blanket, cushions, and candles

Curating a playlist of romant
          ic music
Planning activities or surprises to enhance the romantic experience
